14098.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>The enjoyment you get from tricks is a
trick in and of itself. Remember that.
Art is a useless thing.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14098.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「芸で得られる　よろこびなんか　まやかしだぜ。
　覚えとけ。芸は　なんの役にも立たねえんだよ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14098.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 개그가 주는 기쁨 따윈 허상이다.
　기억해 둬라, 개그는 아무짝에 쓸모없단 걸.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14098.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>技艺所带来的快乐永远都是虚假的。
你记住，技艺一点用处都没有。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14098.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>技藝所帶來的快樂永遠都是虛假的。
你記住，技藝沒有任何用處。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14099.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Hey, look who it is.
Oh man, <cs_pchero>.
I missed you so much buddy.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14099.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……へへ　誰かと思ったら　<cs_pchero>か。
　会いたかったぜ　とーってもな。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14099.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……헤헤, 누군가 했더니 {cs_pchero}|hpp(이로,로)군.
　보고 싶었다, 아주 많~이.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14099.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……嘿嘿，我以为是谁呢，原来是<cs_pchero>啊。
我可想死你啦。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14099.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……嘿嘿，我以為是誰呢，
原來是<cs_pchero>啊。我可想死你啦。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14100.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>You're training under Polfan, so I assume
you share the beliefs of his admirable training?<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14100.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「ポルファンの元で　修行してるってことは
　お前も　ご立派な教えに共感してんだろ？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14100.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 포르판 밑에서 수련 중이란 건
　너도 그 잘난 가르침에 공감한단 뜻이군?<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14100.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>既然你跟着珀尔凡修行，
肯定也对他的教诲产生了共鸣吧？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14100.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>既然你跟著珀爾凡修行，
肯定也對他的教誨產生了共鳴吧？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14101.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Of course I mean that thing he has about
art being able to save people.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14101.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「芸は　人を救えるって　アレだよ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14101.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 개그가 사람을 구할 수 있다는 헛소리 말이야.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14101.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>说什么技艺能够拯救他人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14101.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>說什麼技藝可以拯救他人。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14102.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Damn you, you son of a bitch!
You people make me sick! You're all
so spoiled I think I might vomit!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14102.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……ハンッ　クソが！　イライラさせやがる！
　どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで　ヘドがでるぜ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14102.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……하, 젠장! 짜증 나는군!
　하나같이 물러터져서 구역질이 치밀어!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14102.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……哼，可恶！真是不爽啊！
每个人都这么天真，真是令人作呕！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14102.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……哼，可惡！真是不爽啊！
每個人都這麼天真，真是令人作嘔！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14103.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I once found despair in my lack of talent
for art. But I have since discovered my
talent for the dark arts instead!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14103.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「オレは　芸の無力さに絶望し
　闇芸人ルルルリーチ様に　尽くすと決めたのだ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14103.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 난 개그의 무력함에 절망해
　어둠의 예능인 루루루리치 님께
　충성하기로 결심했다!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14103.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我对毫无用处的技艺感到绝望，
决定效忠于暗艺人露露露里奇了！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14103.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我對毫無用處的技藝感到絕望，
決定效忠於黑暗藝人魯路爾理奇大人了！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14104.en:
Here we go, little buddy. , if you can really save people with your art, then let's see it! If you really think its
possible to help people with art then prove it to me now!
14104.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「いくぞ　弟弟子　<cs_pchero>よ！
　本当に芸で人を救えるのなら
　それを　オレの前で　証明してみせろ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14104.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 간다, 내 사제 {cs_pchero}|hpp(이여,여)!
　진정 개그로 사람을 구할 수 있다면
　내게 그걸 증명해 봐라!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14104.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>来吧，<cs_pchero>！
如果技艺真的能够拯救他人的话，
你就在我眼前证明这点吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14104.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>來吧，<cs_pchero>師弟！
如果技藝真的能夠拯救他人，
你就在我眼前證明這點吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14105.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Kukuku. You're quite good.
But unfortunately for you that won't stop me.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14105.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……ククク。なかなか　やるな。
　だが　それでは　オレは止められんぞ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14105.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……큭큭큭, 꽤 하는군.
　하지만 그 정도로는 날 막을 수 없다.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14105.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……呵呵呵。干得不错啊。
但是，这样是无法阻止我的。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14105.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……呵呵呵，還挺行的嘛。
但是，這樣是無法阻止我的。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14106.en:
The injuries on Demon Clown Gazer's
body healed up rapidly.
14106.ja:
悪魔道化師ゲイザーの身体のキズが
見る見るうちに　ふさがっていく。
14106.ko:
악마 광대 게이저의 몸에 난 상처가
순식간에 아물었다.
14106.zh-Hans:
恶魔小丑盖撒身上的伤口
渐渐地愈合了。
14106.zh-Hant:
惡魔小丑蓋札身上的傷口
漸漸地癒合了。

14107.en:
I was given this body by Lulu Leach. It can regenerate no matter how many injuries it endures.
It was designed for one task: to eliminate minstrels.
14107.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「オレは　旅芸人を抹殺するため
　何度　ケガを負っても　復活する身体を
　ルルルリーチ様から　与えられたのだ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14107.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 난 유랑 예능인을 말살하기 위해
　루루루리치 님께 아무리 다쳐도
　금세 부활하는 몸을 받았다.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14107.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我为了抹杀旅行艺人，
从露露露里奇大人那里获得了
不管负伤多少次也能愈合的身体。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14107.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我為了抹殺旅行藝人，
從魯路爾理奇大人那裡獲得了
不管負傷多少次也能癒合的身體。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14108.en:
Young apprentice. If this art is not a lie, if you can truly save people with it, then let me see the Pratfall taught to
you by Polfan!
14108.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が　いつわりでないのなら
　芸で人を救えるというのなら　ポルファンに
　言われたとおり　オレに　ボケを決めてみせろ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14108.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 사제여, 네 개그가 거짓이 아니라면
　개그로 사람을 구할 수 있다면
　포르판의 말대로 슬랩스틱으로 날 웃겨 봐라!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14108.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>师弟啊，如果你的技艺不是假的，
如果你说靠技艺就能拯救他人，那就
照珀尔凡说的，向我证明你高超的装傻技巧吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14108.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>師弟，如果你的技藝並無虛假，
靠技藝就能拯救他人，那就照珀爾凡所說的，
用你那高超的裝傻技巧向我證明吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14109.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>You can't save people with these foolish
tricks. Until you understand that, I will
crush you time and time again!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14109.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……芸で　人なんか救えねえ。 
　それがわかるまで　何百回でも　何千回でも
　お前を　たたきつぶしてやるっ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14109.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……개그로는 사람을 구할 수 없다.
　그걸 깨달을 때까지 몇백, 몇천 번이고
　널 짓밟아 주마!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14109.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……技艺无法拯救人。
我会将你打倒上百次、上千次，
直到你明白过来为止！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14109.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……技藝無法拯救人。
不管要打倒你幾百次、幾千次，
我都會打到讓你明白為止！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14110.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Tch... Art can help people...<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14110.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「芸は　人を救う……。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14110.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 개그가 사람을 구한다…….<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14110.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>技艺，是可以拯救他人的……<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14110.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>技藝可以拯救他人……<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14111.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>If the words of Polfan are indeed true,
then let's see you stop me!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14111.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「ポルファンの言葉が　いつわりでないのなら
　このオレを　止めてみせろ！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14111.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 포르판의 말이 사실이라면
　날 막아 봐라!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14111.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>珀尔凡这番话如果不是假的，
那就来阻止我吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14111.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>珀爾凡這番話如果沒有半分虛假，
那就來阻止我吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14112.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>You're good. My apprentice. I've
certainly seen your artistry.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14112.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。
　お前の芸　確かに見せてもらったぜ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14112.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……제법이군, 사제.
　네 개그는 똑똑히 봤다.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14112.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……干得不错啊。
我感受到你的技艺了。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14112.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……挺厲害的嘛，師弟。
我確實見證到你的技藝了。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14113.en: <start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>It was a good Pratfall...<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14113.ja: <start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>「いいボケだった……。<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14113.ko: <start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>: 멋진 슬랩스틱이었어…….<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14113.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>装傻的技巧很高超嘛……<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14113.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>裝傻的技巧很高超嘛……<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14114.en:
<start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>For the first time in a while, I
remembered laughing when I was a
human. It was... actually pretty funny.<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14114.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>「ひさしぶりに　人間のころの笑いを思いだした。
　ははっ　なかなか　面白かったよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14114.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>: 오랜만에 인간이었을 때
　웃었던 게 떠오르더군.
　하하, 꽤 재밌었어…….<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14114.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>我久违地想起了作为人类时的笑声。
哈哈，真是有趣的啊……<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14114.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00796 _normal m00001>我久違地想起了作為人類時的笑聲。
哈哈，還真是有趣啊……<stop_lip_animation n00796 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14115.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Ah~ ah, even though I took advantage of my
own hatred to try to win, it still didn't work out.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14115.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「あ～あ　せっかく　キミの中にあった
　芸を憎む心を　利用してあげたのに。
　ずいぶん　カンタンに負けちゃったね。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14115.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 아아~ 기껏 네 안에 있던
　개그를 증오하는 마음을 이용했더니만
　이렇게 쉽게 지다니 맥 빠지네.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14115.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>唉～难得让我们利用了
你心中对技艺的憎恨呢。
你却这么轻易就输掉了。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14115.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>唉～枉費我們還特地利用了
你心中對技藝的憎恨。
你卻這麼輕易就輸掉了。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14116.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Darn, I could've made a pretty good
monster outta you if you weren't such a
goody-two-shoes.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14116.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「ルルルリーチ様は　人間のわりに
　邪悪なオーラを持っていた　キミを気に入って
　魔物に　してあげたのになぁ。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14116.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 루루루리치 님은 인간 치고는
　사악한 오라를 지닌 널 높이 사
　마물로 만들어 주신 건데 말이야.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14116.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>露露露里奇大人就是看上了
身为人类却拥有邪恶气息的你，
才把你变成怪物的。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14116.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>魯路爾理奇大人就是看上了
身為人類卻擁有邪惡氣息的你，
才把你變成怪物的。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14117.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Okay, you've done enough. It looks like
it's time for you to move along.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14117.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「もう　用済みだねぇ。
　だいぶ　旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし
　そろそろ　死んじゃっていいよ。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14117.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 이젠 이용 가치가 없겠어.
　그래도 유랑 예능인을 많이 죽여 줬으니
　이제 그만 죽어도 괜찮아.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14117.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>你已经没用了。
看你也杀死了不少旅行艺人，差不多可以去死了。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14117.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>你已經沒用了。
看你似乎也殺了不少的旅行藝人，
差不多可以去死了。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
